title: TypeError: 1 has type int, but expected one of: bytes, unicode
body:
### System information - **Have I written custom code (as opposed to using a stock example script provided in MLflow)**: No - **OS Platform and Distribution (e.g., Linux Ubuntu 16.04)**:Linux Ubuntu 16.04 - **MLflow installed from (source or binary)**: pip install mlflow - **MLflow version (run ``mlflow --version``)**:0.9.1 - **Python version**: Python 3.5.2 (default, Nov 23 2017, 16:37:01) | [GCC 5.4.0 20160609] on linux - **Exact [command](#command) I am using to start tracking server**: `mlflow server -h 0.0.0.0 -p 5000 --default-artifact-root s3://bucket name --backend-store-uri mysql://user:password@localhost:3306/mlflow` ### Describe the problem mlflow works fine with default artifact and backend-store The problem comes when I am running mlflow tracking server to log runs with the artifact as s3 and backend store as MySQL. with above [command](https://github.com/mlflow/mlflow/issues/new#command), I am running the tracking server and below is the code which is sending logs to the tracking server. ### Source code to send logs and error on the client side `from __future__ import print_function import numpy as np from sklearn.linear_model import LogisticRegression import mlflow import mlflow.sklearn mlflow.set_tracking_uri("http://0.0.0.0:5000") if __name__ == "__main__": with mlflow.start_run(): print(mlflow.get_artifact_uri()) X = np.array([-2, -1, 0, 1, 2, 1,3,6 ]).reshape(-1, 1) y = np.array([0, 0, 1, 1, 1, 0,4 ,20 ]) penality = "l1" lr = LogisticRegression(penalty=penality) mlflow.log_param("penality",penality) lr.fit(X, y) score = lr.score(X, y) print("Score: %s" % score) mlflow.log_metric("score", score) mlflow.sklearn.log_model(lr, "model") print("Model saved in run %s" % mlflow.active_run().info.run_uuid)` # Trace log on the _client_ side: ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- 2019/05/24 19:07:20 ERROR mlflow.utils.rest_utils: API request to http://0.0.0.0:5000/api/2.0/preview/mlflow/runs/get failed with code 500 != 200, retrying up to 2 more times. API response body: 500 Internal Server Error Internal Server Error

The server encountered an internal error and was unable to complete your request. Either the server is overloaded or there is an error in the application.

2019/05/24 19:07:23 ERROR mlflow.utils.rest_utils: API request to http://0.0.0.0:5000/api/2.0/preview/mlflow/runs/get failed with code 500 != 200, retrying up to 1 more times. API response body: 500 Internal Server Error Internal Server Error

The server encountered an internal error and was unable to complete your request. Either the server is overloaded or there is an error in the application.

2019/05/24 19:07:26 ERROR mlflow.utils.rest_utils: API request to http://0.0.0.0:5000/api/2.0/preview/mlflow/runs/get failed with code 500 != 200, retrying up to 0 more times. API response body: 500 Internal Server Error Internal Server Error

The server encountered an internal error and was unable to complete your request. Either the server is overloaded or there is an error in the application.

The server encountered an internal error and was unable to complete your request. Either the server is overloaded or there is an error in the application.
